rings.name: Duo Beaded Stacker Ring
rings.description: To answer your question, yes, every jewelry wardrobe requires a beaded ring. It’s our iconic texture that’s loved and stacked by all—so we had no choice but to double it. More is more. Handcrafted in 18k gold vermeil.

rings.name: Celestial Sapphire Ring
rings.description: The ideal band for your next chapter. Lightweight, wearable and enduring, it’s the perfect piece to symbolize your unbreakable bond. Or, to bring in as a permanent part of your ring stack—it’s made to last a lifetime. Handcrafted in recycled 14k solid gold featuring domed edges.

rings.name: Stacker Ring
rings.description: The Stacker is the white tee of rings. It is everyone's go-to because there's nothing it can't go with (trust us). This 14k solid gold essential is the perfect starter ring or addition to anyone's collection.

rings.name: Daily Stacker Ring
rings.description: Every wardrobe needs its foundational basics. Like a classic white shirt, you’ll keep this ring on rotation. Handcrafted in vermeil, a thick 18k gold layer on sterling silver. They’re polished and easy with high-impact shine—exactly what you were looking for.

rings.name: Metallic Sphere Ring
rings.description: A bold statement maker with the timelessness of a good white T. Handcrafted in 18k gold vermeil.
